Process.name: CO2 + ph -> .74 x CO2++(X-C-KSHELL) 0.26 x CO2+(X) 0.26 x Fluo-auger(X-C)
Process.Notes: Adapted nm -> eV, Torr box, Avakyan (1998)
Process.texnote: K-shell photoionization of CO$_2$, with excitation of the C, from the review work \cite{Avakyan1998}. Claimed uncertainty of 20\%. The rate for the double ionization (including the following dissociation, not studied) is 74\%, letting 26\% of Auger fluorescence. The energy of the Auger electron (ejected in the double ionization cases) is 223 eV. The reported values in \cite{Avakyan1998} were in nm, following several boxes, including lines, and were adapted in eV for the database.
